name: LURK (itch)
description:
*Updated: Fixed a critical bug that occasionally froze the game at start and after restarting.

WARNING: Prepare to die a lot.

As a traveler you chose the wrong village to visit this time. A terrible curse made all villagers sick and at the very moment you stepped into this land, you were cursed too. Now destroy the source of evil in last 30 days of your life or die!

Controls
WASD - D-Pad
K - Button A
L - Button B

Credits
This game was developed by
Anıl Demir (graphics)
Andrés Ruiz Bernabeu (code)
Ted Wennerström (music)

for

GBJam 5
2016
